name: Turkey and Avocado Panini
author: Avocados from Mexico
summary: Pressed between warm slices of bread and dressed with honey Dijon, this combination of oven-roasted deli turkey, creamy ripe avocado, crumbled goat cheese and baby spinach melts together for delicious flavor and texture that will leave you happily satisfied. Enjoy a fancy little panini that takes no time at all!
ingredients: 4 slices artisan bread such as ciabatta
¼ pound sliced oven-roasted deli turkey breast
¼  red onion, cut into strips
1  ripe avocado from Mexico, peeled, pitted and thickly sliced
¼ cup crumbled soft goat cheese
directions: Spread one side of sandwiches with honey Dijon dressing, and top with baby spinach leaves
Next, layer turkey breast and red onion over the spinach
On the other half of the sandwich, place the avocado slices
Season to taste with salt and pepper
Sprinkle goat cheese over avocado slices
Preheat a panini press according to manufacturer's directions
Spray panini press with cooking spray
Place sandwiches into the press and close
Cook until the bread is toasted and crisp, with golden brown grill marks and the cheese begins to melt, 5 to 8 minutes
